int main() {

        int current_abs = abs(a0);

        if (current_abs > max_val) {

            max_val = current_abs;

            max_sign = (a0 >0) ? 1 : (a0 <0 ? -1 :0);

            max_index =i;

        }

    }

    int n;

    if (max_sign ==0) {

        n =0;

    } else {

        n = 2*N -1;

    }

    // Now compute second part.

        // Initialize prev array.

        int prev[64] = {0};

        prev[63] =1; // TTT is index 63.

        for (int cur=0; cur <n; cur++) {

            int curr[64] = {0};

                    s[4] = '\0';

                    if (ok(s)) {

                        // compute new_idx.

                        int new_last3_idx = ( ( ( (last3_idx /4) %4 ) *16 ) ) + ( ( (last3_idx %4) ) *4 ) + new_char;

                        curr[new_last3_idx] = (curr[new_last3_idx] + prev[last3_idx]) % mod;

                    }

                }

            }

            // copy curr to prev.

            for (int i=0; i<64; i++) {

                prev[i] = curr[i];

            }

        }

        long long total =0;

        for (int i=0; i<64; i++) {

            total = (total + prev[i]) % mod;

        }

        printf("%lld\n", total);

    }

    return 0;
